document_data.name: ''Moonshade''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moonshade''''' was a unique ''[[cloak of protection]]'' that could be found in the catacombs of [[Darkmoon|Temple Darkmoon]].
document_data.Description: The item functioned as a protective [[cloak]] with a ''+3'' enchantment. It was stored in a hidden room in the second deepest level of the catacombs of Darkmoon. The room that held ''Moonshade'' also contained a [[longbow]] with eight enchanted [[arrow]]s.
